    • setFirstPlayer

      public void setFirstPlayer(List<Player> players)
      Sets the first player and updates the player order based on random selection. Each player has as next player the one that has connected after them (clockwise order)
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players participating in the game

    • isLastTurn

      public void setErrorType(Warnings errorType)
      Sets the error type for the game. The errorType is used to notify the listener that an invalid action has occurred.
      Parameters:
      errorType - the error type to be set

      Returns:

      Sets the error type for the game with a specific nickname.
      Parameters:
      errorType - the error type to be set
      nickname - the nickname of the player associated with the error

    • droppedTile

      public void droppedTile(Tile tile, int column)
      Drops a tile into the player's shelf at the specified column.
      Parameters:
      tile - the tile to be dropped
      column - the column in which the tile is dropped

    • newTurn

      public void newTurn()
      Initiates a new turn in the game. Notifies the registered listeners about the new turn and updates the game state.

    • resumingTurn

      public void resumingTurn()

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game and calculates the final points for each player. Notifies the registered listeners to print the final game state and display the final points.

    • addModelListener

      public void addModelListener(ModelListener l)
      Adds a ModelListener to the game.
      Parameters:
      l - the ModelListener to be added

    • removeModelListener

      public void removeModelListener(ModelListener l)
      Removes a ModelListener from the game.
      Parameters:
      l - the ModelListener to be removed

    • selectionControl

      public void selectionControl()
      Controls the selection of tiles by the current player. If the player has not chosen any tiles, it sends a warning to the listeners. Otherwise, it prompts the listeners to ask for the column selection.

    • checkMaxNumberOfTilesChosen

      public void checkMaxNumberOfTilesChosen()
      Checks if the current player has chosen the maximum number of tiles allowed. If the maximum number of tiles is reached, no more actions can be performed, and they will be asked to choose a column where to drop the tiles. It sends a warning to the listeners if any of the following conditions are met: - The current player has chosen their shelf's maximum column space tiles. - There are no more available tiles for the current player. - The current player has already chosen the maximum number of tiles (3). Otherwise, it prompts the listeners to ask for the next action.

    • isEnd

      public boolean isEnd()
      Checks if the game has ended.
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise.

    • isStart

      public boolean isStart()
      Checks if the game has started.
      Returns:
      true if the game has started, false otherwise.

    • newMessage

      public void newMessage(String sender, String receiver, String message)
      Sends a new message between players.
      Parameters:
      sender - the sender of the message
      receiver - the receiver of the message
      message - the content of the message

    • printGame

      public void printGame()
      Prints the current state of the game. This method notifies all registered listeners to print the game.
